reuters.title: SCUDDER NEW ASIA FUND INITIAL OFFERING STARTS
reuters.body: Lead underwriters Salomon Inc <SB>, PaineWebber Group Inc <PWJ> and Shearson Lehman Brothers Holdings Inc <SHE> said an initial public offering of seven mln common shares of Scudder New Asia Fund Inc is underway at 12 dlrs each. Underwriters have been granted an option to buy up to another 1,050,000 shares to cover overallotments. Reuter 
